title: Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)
descriptions:
### Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)

**Product Overview:**
Enjoy the magical world of Barbie Land with this comprehensive Blu-Ray + Digital collection. Dive into a story filled with adventure and self-discovery, featuring a main character who faces an existential crisis while trying to navigate the challenges of being a Ken.

**Setting:**
Barbie Land – A perfect world with a twist.

**Character Conditions:**
- Existential Crisis
- Being a Ken

**Bonus Content:**
- **It’s a Weird World:** Explore the quirky and unexpected aspects of Barbie's world.
- **All-Star Barbie Party:** Join in the fun with a star-studded celebration featuring all your favorite Barbies.
- **Musical Make-Believe:** Sing and dance to the enchanting tunes in this musical adventure.
- **Becoming Barbie:** Learn how to transform and unleash your inner Barbie.
- **Welcome to Barbie Land:** Discover the magical secrets of Barbie's world.
- **Playing Dress-Up: An Extended Look at the Costumes of Barbie** – Dive into the detailed and beautiful costumes that make Barbie's world so special.

**Product Features:**
- **Blu-Ray Disc:** Watch the full story in stunning high-definition.
- **Digital Download:** Access the content on your favorite device for convenient viewing.
- **Interactive Extras:** Engage with the bonus content and bring the magic of Barbie Land to life.

Perfect for fans of the iconic Barbie brand and anyone who loves a good story with a touch of self-reflection. Dive into the world of Barbie Land and experience the magic for yourself!
